      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      clears framebuffer with the given color

      Draws rectangle for the Pixmap at the specified coordinate which is the top-left corner.

      Draws rectangle for the Pixmap at the specified coordinate which is the top-left corner.
      void drawRect(int x, int y, int width, int height, int color)
      Draws a rectangle that starts at top-left at the given pixel and extends to the specified height and width.

      returns height of framebuffer in pixels

      Loads an image from a file and transforms it into a Pixmap
